data.name: Papertris
data.detailed_description:
Update 1.03

Update Notes 1.03:

The following languages are now supported:

English, German, Spanish, French, Italian

---

Update Notes 1.02:

  • The duration of the blocking cubes in 2 player mode has been increased from 5 to 9 to make it even more challenging for the opponent.
  • In addition, some small bugs in the controls have been fixed.

---

Update Notes 1.01:

  • Added a Fast Drop / Hard Drop to make the cubes fall faster with one click.
    (changed keys can be seen in the controls settings)
  • Added a left-right slide that slides the cubes by holding the left or right button.
  • Added starting level bonus in endless mode, which counts currently destroyed cubes points per starting level, but without combo and power cube bonus.
  • Some color adjustments have been made to the cubes so that they can now be better distinguished from, for example, light and dark green & red and orange.
  • Also fixed some minor bugs in the AI.

---

Have fun to play :-)


About the Game

Papertris is an interesting and fun arcade puzzle game in which colored cubes dissolve in all 6 possible directions and you decide where to place your cubes.
In addition, there are also power cubes and numerous possible combinations in a classic but modern and lovingly hand-painted game.



  • The Challenge mode is tricky with various tasks where the player has to solve suitable tasks in order to get to the next level, which are more difficult at each level
  • In the Endless mode, which gets faster and more difficult from level to level, you can score points as long as you can
  • The 2 player VS mode demands tactical skill in which players can use numerous combos to send each other blocking cubes to block the opponent's options
  • Combinations of the cubes in all 6 directions
  • Atmospheric music
  • Icon option for color blind people
  • Dark mode
  • Full Controller support



The game itself was designed with a lot of fun and inventiveness with my kids (4y & 2y) and the majority of the game was hand-painted by them, which thus has a beautiful and playful charm.
We really had a lot of fun creating and collecting ideas for the game and hope to inspire you as much as we do.

data.short_description: Papertris is a fast and exciting arcade puzzle game that combines classic gameplay with fresh new features
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 64 Bit
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD-Graphics 6000 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 314 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: 1 or 2 Controller needed for local multiplayer
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 64 Bit
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 314 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: 1 or 2 Controller needed for local multiplayer
